text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to recommend obtaining an Advance Tariff Ruling (ATR) from HMRC for the Alpine model due to its novel refrigerant. While BTI/Origin Ruling serves a similar purpose to an ATR in providing certainty, the specific term 'Advance Tariff Ruling' (ATR) was not explicitly used as the primary recommendation for the Alpine model's specific issue (refrigerant classification/origin impact).
